column1: Her service will be held Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. from the St. Paul Catholic Church in Odell with Father David Sabel officiating. Burial will be at St. Paul Catholic Cemetery in Odell. Visitation will be Wednesday
column5: 2015 from 9:00 a.m. until the time of the service from the St. Paul Catholic Church in Odell.
